values.common: background-color, border-color, color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, translate, transform
values.position: left, right, top, bottom, inset-inline, inset-block

heading.value: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

body.value: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

base.background: linear-gradient(var(--color), var(--color)), repeating-conic-gradient(var(--checker-fg) 0%, var(--checker-fg) 25%, var(--checker-bg) 0%, var(--checker-bg) 50%) 0% 50% / var(--checker-size) var(--checker-size) !important

_indeterminate.animation: position 1s ease infinite normal none running

range.backgroundImage: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--stripe-color) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 50%, var(--stripe-color) 50%, var(--stripe-color) 75%, transparent 75%, transparent)

swatch.background: linear-gradient(var(--color), var(--color)), repeating-conic-gradient(var(--checker-fg) 0%, var(--checker-fg) 25%, var(--checker-bg) 0%, var(--checker-bg) 50%) 0% 50% / var(--checker-size) var(--checker-size) !important
